publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-769 Sarah Boyack on behalf of the Environment and Rural Development Committee: Report on Inquiry into the National Waste Plan-That the Parliament notes the recommendations contained in the Environment and Rural Development Committee's 4th Report 2003 (Session 2): Inquiry into the National Waste Plan (SP Paper 47).
S2M-769 Report on Inquiry into the National Waste Plan (lodged on 9 January 2004) Eleanor Scott*

S2M-769 Sarah Boyack on behalf of the Environment and Rural Development Committee: Report on Inquiry into the National Waste Plan-That the Parliament notes the recommendations contained in the Environment and Rural Development Committee's 4th Report 2003 (Session 2): Inquiry into the National Waste Plan (SP Paper 47). Supported by: Eleanor Scott
